newsitem.title: ECUADOR: Ecuador inflation falls to 1.46 pct in March.
newsitem.headline: Ecuador inflation falls to 1.46 pct in March.

text.p: Ecuador's Consumer Price Index rose by 1.46 percent in March, down from 2.9 percent registered during the same month last year, the National Statistics and Census Institute said Tuesday.
Inflation for the past 12 months was 29.88 percent.
Cumulative inflation for the first three months of 1997 was 11.7 percent, up from 8.1 percent in the similar 1996 period.
The government expects 1997 inflation to be around 30 percent, up from 25.5 percent in 1996.
